name: 黃有評
objective:
機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
The goal of probability is to develop the ability for undergraduate students to construct and analyze probabilistic models in a manner that combines intuitive understanding and mathematical precision.
schedule:
Week 1.Introduction to probabilty and counting
Week 2~3.Some probability laws
Week 4~5.Discrete distributions
Week 6~7.Continuous distributions
Week 8.Mid-term exam.
Week 9~11. Mean and variance of a distribution
Week 12~13.Inference on proportions
Week 14~15.Linear regression and correlation
Week 16~17.Analysis of variance
Week 18.Final exam.
materials:
textbook:
J.S. Milton, J.C. Arnold and K.I. Liu, Probability and Statistics for Engineering and the Computing Sciences, McGraw Hill, 東華書局代理
reference:
Walpole, Myers, Myers and Ye, Essentials of Probability & Statistics for Engineers & Scientists, Pearson. 滄海圖書代理
